overview:
The journey from Pramod Maloo, a slow learner at school, to Premo19, an accomplished entrepreneur, has been a long one. And yet, at every moment it seems that it’s just the beginning. He is no Einstein. But with series of success in last few years, he has marked a name for himself in the online domain.

With Graduation in Commerce followed by an MBA in Marketing, his career budded as a Digital Consultant & then Search Engine Marketing Expert. Currently, he is the Founder & Head at Kreative Machinez, Co-Founder at FirstPageTicket, FirstPageContent & YogaExpertsOnline and serves as Chief Search Engine Consultant for a Logo Design & Security Camera related website Along with attaining new heights of success at his current engagements, he has the mission of materializing a few dream projects. Two of these concern his prime interests â€“ Spreading words about Yoga and getting engaged in Corporate Training. YogaExpertsOnline has already made its way and is trekking forward. Ground work for Corporate Training is on.
